pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Snakecase Coverter> Covert camelCase to snake_case## Screenshot## Install```$ pip install snakecase```## Usage```pythonimport snakecaseprint (snakecase.convert("YoginthVar"))#=> yoginth_varprint (snakecase.convert("thisVariable"))#=> this_variable```## Get HelpThere are few ways to get help: 1. Please [post questions on Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/ask). You can open issues with questions, as long you add a link to your Stack Overflow question. 2. For bug reports and feature requests, open issues. 3. For direct and quick help, you can [email me](mailto://yoginth@zoho.com).## How to contributeHave an idea? Found a bug? See [how to contribute][contributing].Thanks!## License[MIT][license][LICENSE]: https://yoginth.mit-license.org/[contributing]: /CONTRIBUTING.md
